scripts.cordova-browser: npm run app && npm run replace-relative-paths && npm run copy-cordova
scripts.cordova-android: npm run app && npm run replace-relative-paths && npm run copy-cordova
scripts.cordova-ios: npm run app && npm run replace-relative-paths && npm run copy-cordova
